subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Mike Sillinger and Andy Hilbert scored 1 minute 18 seconds apart early in the third period to help the Islanders defeat Philadelphia, 4-2, on Thursday night.
snippet: Mike Sillinger and Andy Hilbert scored 1 minute 18 seconds apart early in the third period to help the Islanders defeat Philadelphia, 4-2, on Thursday night.
